questions.question_text: The baseline sam_admin role contains the additional roles of: sam_user, asset, and procurement_user, and which of the following? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C, D is the right answer

C,D: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/reference/r_SAMRoles.html

Although ServiceNow did not indicate Procurement_User in this list of SAM_ADMIN roles...https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/procurement/reference/r_ProcurementRoles.html

comments.content: Yep, just checked sys_user_role and indeed, C - contract_manager & D - model_manager

discussion.content:
It says to choose two - the answer is:
C - contract_manager
D - model_manager

Selected Answer: C
C - correct answer

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of an external audit?

choices.B: To determine compliance with internally-defined vendor processes
choices.C: To determine compliance with signed vendor agreements/contracts
choices.D: To ensure your entitlements do not exceed your allocations
choices.A: To ensure your users are not running any blacklisted software
choices.E: To determine compliance with licensing agreements regarding who, how, and when freeware software is being used

discussion.content:
A & C.
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/c_SAMReconciliation.html

In addition to creating a purchase order for new software licenses, additional remediation options are available in software model results. Use the results to automatically create and remove allocations, remove unallocated installs, and remove unlicensed installs.

Selected Answer: AC
A & C. B&D don't exist as remediation options.

Selected Answer: AC
A and C

questions.question_text: In addition to creating a new purchase order for software licenses, additional remediation options are available in Software Model results to: (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The question iteself is misleading. The right verbiage would be more like: " What list can include records that originate from manual creation, remediation options, and reclamation rules?" And yes, C is correct.

questions.question_text: What list can include manual creation, remediation options, and reclamation rules?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACD
query table "samp_remediation_option" with "display_name=per user" or "display_name=per device" group by "remediation_action"
Result: 
Remediation action: Create Allocations (82)
Remediation action: Purchase Rights (7)
Remediation action: Remove Allocations (8)
Remediation action: Remove Unallocated Installs (82)

Selected Answer: CDE
CDE - Remove installs (unallocated or unlicensed) not available for Oracle DB options ~ docs.servicenow
Agree looked up 4 Remediation Options - Purchase Rights, Create allocations, remove allocations, remove unlicensed installs - B ,C.D, E

Selected Answer: BCE
From the course:
When software models are Not Compliant there are 4 remediation options available:
Purchase Rights
Create Allocations
Remove Allocations
Remove Unlicensed Installs

questions.question_text: Which of the following remediation options can be performed on an individual user or device basis? (Choose three.)
